title: Breast cancer may be likelier to spread to bone with nighttime dim-light exposure

title_detail.value: Breast cancer may be likelier to spread to bone with nighttime dim-light exposure

summary: Exposure to dim light at night, which is common in today's lifestyle, may contribute to the spread of breast cancer to the bones, researchers have shown for the first time in an animal study.

summary_detail.value: Exposure to dim light at night, which is common in today's lifestyle, may contribute to the spread of breast cancer to the bones, researchers have shown for the first time in an animal study.
